breadcrumbs: B. “Test”, “Inspection” and “Production Equipment”

Semiconductor manufacturing deposition equipment, as follows:
Equipment or systems designed for multistep processing in multiple chambers or stations, as follows:

structure.heading: Equipment designed to fabricate a metal contact by performing all of the following processes:
structure.label: 3B001.d.4.b – Equipment designed to fabricate a metal contact by performing all of the following processes:

children.heading: 1 Surface treatment process using a remote plasma generator and an ion filter; and

content.text: d.4.b.1 Surface treatment process using a remote plasma generator and an ion filter; and

children.heading: Deposition of a cobalt (Co) layer selectively onto copper (Cu) using an organometallic compound;

content.html: d.4.b.2. Deposition of a cobalt (Co) layer selectively onto copper (Cu) using an organometallic compound;

Note:

This control does not apply to equipment that is non-selective.
